greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A104210: a(n) = 1 if n is divisible by at least 2 consecutive primes, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Array[Boole@ MemberQ[Differences@ PrimePi@ FactorInteger[#][[All, 1]], 1] &, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 16 2017 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 15 2017
